name: World of Warcraft Text File
summary: Learn about .WTF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: WoW settings can be modified by opening and editing WTF files in a text editor. Make sure to backup the WTF file before editing it since incorrect changes may corrupt the file.

description: Text file used by World of Warcraft (WoW) to save various game settings; for example, Config.wtf saves audio and display settings; Realmlist.wtf stores realms in which players can play on different private servers.
